body.p: The OpenGL API reference pages have been updated to HTML5 format and relocated. You should only have reached this page from a stale search engine link (these will eventually update), or a link or bookmark (which you are encouraged to update, if possible).
If you are using a modern browser, you can:

li.p: Wait to be redirected to the new reference page.
Click to go directly to the new reference page.
Click to go to the new index page.

body.p: If you are are using Internet Explorer 8 or earlier versions of IE which cannot properly display HTML5, and cannot upgrade to a modern browser, there is a cached copy of the old page available. Note that these old pages will not be updated and will eventually be removed.
